summary: ICP dapp scaffold with Motoko backend canister and React/Vite + Tailwind frontend, including Internet Identity authentication hooks and a shadcn/ui component library, plus build/deploy templates and asset generation utilities.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with generated TypeScript bindings and canister configuration for local/dev deployment.

existing_features.title: React/Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend web app using React with Vite build tooling and Tailwind CSS, including basic app entrypoints and configuration.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks/utilities to authenticate users via Internet Identity and create an authenticated actor for backend calls.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library included
existing_features.description: Large set of prebuilt shadcn/ui components added to the frontend for rapid UI development.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP project
existing_features.description: Template includes Dockerfile, deploy script, workspace/package setup, and canister manifests for backend/frontend.

existing_features.title: Asset generation & image utilities
existing_features.description: Scripts and pipeline support for resizing images and pruning unused generated assets; includes at least one generated asset in the repo.

existing_features.title: Enhance the Valentine page with additional sweet, romantic animations beyond the current pulse/bounce effects, including a subtle ambient background animation (e.g., floating hearts/particles) that runs on both the question screen and the success screen.

Add smooth UI transitions to make state changes feel sweeter, including a more polished transition when switching from the question screen to the success screen after clicking the Yes button (e.g., fade/scale transition for the main card/content).

Add small micro-interactions that reinforce the romantic tone: improve hover/tap feedback on the Yes button (e.g., gentle shimmer/glow or soft bounce) and add a playful motion cue for the evasive No button (e.g., a short wiggle before/while it moves) without changing its evasive behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add sweet romantic animations to the interactive Valentine web page (e.g., subtle transitions/heart float effects) to enhance the experience.

architectural_notes: Project targets Internet Computer (ICP) with separate backend (Motoko canister) and frontend canisters configured via canister.yaml manifests.
Frontend uses React + Vite with Tailwind CSS, managed via pnpm workspace tooling.
Authentication is designed around Internet Identity with hooks for login and actor creation.
UI layer is built on shadcn/ui components with custom ESLint rules for ICP-related constraints.
Repository includes build-template artifacts (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml) to standardize packaging and deployment.
Image pipeline utilities exist for resizing and pruning generated assets.

generatedImages.description: Generated frontend asset (valentine meme image) included as part of the asset generation pipeline.
